remarks.para: May be inoperative provided barrier is secured closed for flight.

numlitem.para: "Cargo Aircraft Only" dangerous goods are not carried on board the aircraft.
"Cargo Aircraft Only" dangerous goods shipments requiring inflight accessibility are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Cockpit Opening Handle "SLIDING DOOR INOP - DO NOT OPEN" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Attach C-clamp, vise grip pliers, or other securing device to sliding door track at location shown below.
